properties.description: Copy payment_card_paymentcardaccount table from hermes to ADLS

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name_on_card as string,
		start_month as integer,
		start_year as integer,
		expiry_month as integer,
		expiry_year as integer,
		status as integer,
		order as integer,
		created as timestamp,
		updated as timestamp,
		issuer_id as integer,
		payment_card_id as integer,
		token as string,
		country as string,
		currency_code as string,
		pan_end as string,
		pan_start as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		fingerprint as string,
		psp_token as string,
		consents as string,
		hash as string,
		formatted_images as string,
		pll_links as string,
		agent_data as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	batchSize: 10000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcPaymentCardAccount
SrcPaymentCardAccount filter(and(toDate(created) >= toDate(subDays(currentUTC(),1)), toDate(created) < toDate(currentUTC()))) ~> FilterRecords
FilterRecords sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name_on_card as string,
		start_month as integer,
		start_year as integer,
		expiry_month as integer,
		expiry_year as integer,
		status as integer,
		order as integer,
		created as timestamp,
		updated as timestamp,
		issuer_id as integer,
		payment_card_id as integer,
		token as string,
		country as string,
		currency_code as string,
		pan_end as string,
		pan_start as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		fingerprint as string,
		psp_token as string,
		consents as string,
		hash as string,
		formatted_images as string,
		pll_links as string,
		agent_data as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DstDataLake
